name: Build Chinese
description:
欢迎来到da汉字游戏

Welcome to Build Chinese.

This is an experience created to share a little bit of the wonder of the ancient Chinese written language.

Test your building skills and beat the clock!

All of the explanations presented here are not to be taken as fact. Chinese characters have been around for 5 thousand years, and any explanations as to why they are the way they are at best educated guesses, and at worse, pure speculation. We have researched the characters as best we can with the help of a professor of the Chinese language, but still it is very unlikely that we are correct in all of our explanations. We apologize for our inaccuracies, and we encourage you to research the Chinese language in more depth.
